message.content: cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV. The paper deals with term weighting approaches in information retrieval and text classification, which are core topics in the fields of information retrieval (cs.IR), natural language processing (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI), and computer vision (cs.CV) where text classification is often used as a pre-processing step.
